CustomField.formula:
If(ISBLANK (txtJobId__c), "Please enter JobID",
HYPERLINK("https://production-backend.heyjobs.de/admin/jobs/" & txtJobId__c & "?utm_source=email&utm_medium=emp_job_preview", "Job Preview Link"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The link with the UTM parameters for tracking the preview
CustomField.label: Job Preview Link
